results.title: Analysis of Insulin Doses of Chinese Type 2 Diabetic Patients with Intensive Insulin Treatment
results.text_hl: Of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ receiving @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ therapy alone or receiving @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the mean @<m>DISEASE_Behcet_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001528 @@@BD@@@/TDD ratio was 0.22 and 0.24 respectively.
